_meta.description: Prompts for LLM to generate error page text (404, 500, etc.)
_meta.usage: Read by Claude to generate app/[locale]/[...rest]/copies/[locale].json (404) and error pages
_meta.note: Error pages should be helpful, not frustrating. Provide clear next steps. Keep tone empathetic.

notFound.title: 404 error heading. Don't blame user. Ex: 'Page Not Found', 'Oops! Lost?', 'This page doesn't exist'
notFound.description: Explain what happened and what they can do. Be helpful. Ex: 'Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for.', 'The page may have moved or doesn't exist.'
notFound.backHome: Button to return home. Ex: 'Back to Home', 'Go Home', 'Take Me Home'
notFound.searchPrompt: Optional: suggest searching. Ex: 'Try searching for what you need', 'Looking for something specific?'

serverError.title: 500 error heading. Take responsibility. Ex: 'Something Went Wrong', 'Our bad!', 'Server Error'
serverError.description: Explain it's on our end and we're working on it. Ex: 'Something went wrong on our end. We're working to fix it. Please try again in a few minutes.'
serverError.refresh: Button to refresh page. Ex: 'Refresh Page', 'Try Again', 'Reload'
serverError.status: Optional: link to status page. Ex: 'Check System Status', 'Service Status'

unauthorized.title: 403 error heading. Ex: 'Access Denied', 'Not Authorized', 'Permission Required'
unauthorized.description: Explain why and what they can do. Ex: 'You don't have permission to access this page. If you believe this is an error, contact support.'
unauthorized.login: Button to log in if not authenticated. Ex: 'Log In', 'Sign In to Continue'
unauthorized.contact: Link to contact support. Ex: 'Contact Support', 'Get Help'

generic.title: Generic error heading. Ex: 'Error', 'Something's Not Right'
generic.description: Generic error message. Ex: 'An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.'
generic.retry: Button to retry action. Ex: 'Try Again', 'Retry', 'Refresh'
